h2_title: Helping Chen Loong Restore the Zodiac Village
content: In addition, the Xu Dog will restock his store as you advance further in your adventure, so be sure to visit him each Chapter both to spend more Mind Cores, and buy new recipes and wares:

This is an excerpt from the file 'Xu_Dog_Questline.md', within the main section titled 'Xu Dog Questline', specifically from the subsection 'Helping Chen Loong Restore the Zodiac Village'.
The content is as follows:
In addition, the Xu Dog will restock his store as you advance further in your adventure, so be sure to visit him each Chapter both to spend more Mind Cores, and buy new recipes and wares:
